WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 0830Z TO 2030Z DAILY
   18 SEP THRU 27 OCT:
   A. IN AREA BOUND BY
      05-42.53S 034-45.02W, 06-09.83S 034-46.82W,
      06-03.93S 034-57.22W, 05-47.03S 034-56.32W.
   B. WITHIN 20 MILES OF 05-54.53S 034-14.92W.
   C. WITHIN 32 MILES OF 05-54.53S 035-14.92W.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2872/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 272130Z OCT 17.
